abstract: Defense Department confirms death of one American service member in operation to eliminate Islamic State militant group.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 15 American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.

headline.main: U.S. Military Deaths in Operations Against ISIS

snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 15 American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
